description:
Join Artist Zoe White in a workshop to explore All Saints Church through collage, sketches and badge making based on the architecture and the people who would use the church such as a bride or baby.  The church is a special place for the artist who feels  sentimental and connected to the building, feelings she wants to share.

This workshop is part of Enfield Creatives’ Collection.

events.name: Drop in: Creative Exploration of All Saints Church
events.notes: All materials provided. Suitable for all ages. Children must be accompanied by an adult.

factsheet.heading: Creative Exploration of All Saints Church
paragraphs: Join artist Zoe White in a workshop to make a bold collage badge of someone who would use the church such as a bride or baby; or explore the amazing characters of Shakespeare’s plays and make a Juliet or Puck badge  using the array of collage and art materials, so you can explore and sketch the beauties of the church. The church is a special place for Zoe who feels sentimental and connected to the building along her with family.
This workshop is part of Enfield Creatives’ Collection.

location.address: All Saint's Church, Church Street, N9 9AT
travel_info: Additional travel info: Tottenham Hale tube Station, then 192 bus to Edmonton Green Bus Station or Edmonton Green Station which is approx. 300 yards from Church.

name: Creative Exploration of All Saints Church
